scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm start"
